name: Shuppet

evolution.description: Shuppet can evolve into Banette at level 10 and above. When it evolves, its health increases by double its level, and it gains 14 points to add to its ability scores (max 20).

description: The Puppet Pokémon. Shuppet grows by feeding on dark emotions, such as vengefulness and envy, in the hearts of people. It roams through cities in search of grudges that taint people.

abilities.name: Insomnia
abilities.description: This Pokémon is immune to sleep.

abilities.name: Frisk
abilities.description: Upon entering a battle, a single opponent’s held item is revealed, if it has one.

abilities.name: Cursed Body
abilities.description: When hit by a melee attack, this Pokémon may roll 1d4. On a result of 4, the opponent who made the attack cannot use the same move on its next turn.
